basic:
Plus one

Basic

Adds one to the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
34 → 35

Minus one

Basic

Subtracts one from the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
22 → 21

Double

Basic

Doubles the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
12 → 24

Halve

Basic

Halves the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
11 → 6

Times five

Basic

Multiplies the selected number by five

This card does not require an input.

Example:
20 → 100

Times ten

Basic

Multiplies the selected number by ten

This card does not require an input.

Example:
15 → 150

Times one hundred

Basic

Multiplies the selected number by one hundred

This card does not require an input.

Example:
25 → 2500

Divided by five

Basic

Divides the selected number by five

This card does not require an input.

Example:
26 → 5

Divided by ten

Basic

Divides the selected number by ten

This card does not require an input.

Example:
177 → 18

Divided by one hundred

Basic

Divides the selected number by one hundred

This card does not require an input.

Example:
260 → 3
common:
Plus

Common

Adds an input to the selected number

This card requires an input.

Example:
32 with input 55 → 87

Minus

Common

Subtracts an input from the selected number

This card requires an input.

Example:
44 with input 55 → -11

Times

Common

Multiplies the selected number by an input

This card requires an input.

Example:
44 with input -2 → -88

Divide

Common

Divides the selected number by an input

This card requires an input.

Examples:
44 with input -2 → -22
-81 with input 0 → -1000000

Negate

Common

Flips the sign of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
211 → -211

Square

Common

Squares the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
4 → 16

Cube

Common

Cubes the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
4 → 64

Square root

Common

Takes the square root of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Examples:
81 → 9
-81 → -9
uncommon:
Power

Uncommon

Raises the selected number to an input power

This card requires an input.

Example:
3 with input 2 → 9

Absolute value

Uncommon

Takes the absolute value of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-2 → 2

Root

Uncommon

Takes the i-th root of the selected number with i an input

This card requires an input.

Example:
64 with input 3 → 4

Append

Uncommon

Appends an input to the end of the selected number

This card requires an input.

Example:
-25 with input 44 → -2544

Prepend

Uncommon

Prepends an input to the start of the selected number

This card requires an input.

Example:
-11 with input 23 → -2311

Digit sum

Uncommon

Takes the sum of all digits of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-233 → -8

Digit product

Uncommon

Takes the product of all digits of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-233 → -18

Randomize

Uncommon

Randomizes the selected number into a new one

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-73 → 5

Digit count

Uncommon

Takes the amount of digits of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-233 → -3

Sort ascending

Uncommon

Sorts all digits of the selected number in ascending order

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-534 → -345

Sort descending

Uncommon

Sorts all digits of the selected number in descending order

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-534 → -543
rare:
Reverse

Rare

Reverses the digit order of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-2538 → -8352

Drop last digit

Rare

Drops the last digit of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-2538 → -253

Drop first digit

Rare

Drops the first digit of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-2538 → -538

Prime jump

Rare

Jumps to the prime number nearest to the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Examples:
218 → 223
-591 → 2

Square jump

Rare

Jumps to the perfect square nearest to the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Examples:
218 → 225
-591 → 0

Modulo

Rare

Reduces the selected number modulo an input

This card requires an input.

Examples:
13 with input 12 → 1
-219 with input 13 → 2

Multiple jump

Rare

Jumps to the multiple of an input nearest to the selected number

This card requires an input.

Examples:
132 with input 5 → 130
-211 with input 13 → -208

Palindrome

Rare

Forms a palindrome by appending the reverse of the selected number to its end

This card does not require an input.

Example:
218 → 21812

Greatest common divisor

Rare

Finds the greatest common divisor of the selected number and an input

This card requires an input.

Example:
-212 with input 318 → 106

Least common multiple

Rare

Finds the least common multiple of the selected number and an input

This card requires an input.

Example:
-212 with input 318 → 636
epic:
Factorial

Epic

Takes the factorial of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Examples:
5 → 120
-5 → -1000000

Fibonacci jump

Epic

Jumps to the Fibonacci number nearest to the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Examples:
52 → 55
-444 → 0

Copy

Epic

Replaces the selected number by an input

This card requires an input.

Examples:
43 with input -22 → -22

Double factorial

Epic

Takes the double factorial of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Examples:
5 → 15
-5 → -1000000

Divisor sum

Epic

Takes the sum of all divisors of the selected number

This card does not require an input.

Examples:
52 → 98
-52 → 98
legendary:
Halve distance

Legendary

Brings the selected number 50% closer to the goal

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-12 with goal 50 → 19

Percentage

Legendary

Finds what percentage of the goal the selected number is

This card does not require an input.

Example:
-12 with goal 50 → -24

Orbit

Legendary

Orbits the selected number around the goal

This card does not require an input.

Example:
35 with goal 50 → 65
